overview: From 2025-09-21 to 2025-09-28, elizaos-plugins/plugin-openrouter had 2 new PRs (2 merged), 0 new issues, and 5 active contributors.

topIssues.title: Add missing tests, and upgrade packages
topIssues.author: standujar
topIssues.body: Just to track it: we need to upgrade to latest ai-sdk / openrouter package and add tests on this plugin

topPRs.title: feat: enhance OpenRouter plugin with AI SDK v5 compatibility
topPRs.author: standujar
topPRs.body:
- Bump to version 1.5.11
- Add configurable max steps for tool execution (OPENROUTER_TOOL_EXECUTION_MAX_STEPS)
- Fix AI SDK v5 compatibility issues:
  - Update generateText to use maxTokens instead of maxOutputTokens
  - Fix generateObject output parameter handling
  - Add maxSteps parameter for multi-step tool execution
- Improve TypeScript type handling in usage events
- Default tool execution max steps to 15 with range validation (1-100)

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

- New Features
  - Added a configurable limit for multi-step tool execution, with a sensible default and safety bounds, enabling finer control over tool runs.

- Refactor
  - Minor internal adjustments to model handling and usage accounting to improve consistency and compatibility.

- Chores
  - Bumped version to 1.5.11.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

topPRs.title: Fix TypeScript error: Replace deprecated maxTokens with maxOutputTokens
topPRs.author: wtfsayo
topPRs.body:
## Problem

The build process was failing with a TypeScript error in `src/models/image.ts`:

```
src/models/image.ts(62,7): error TS2353: Object literal may only specify known properties, and 'maxTokens' does not exist in type 'CallSettings & { system?: string | undefined; } & { messages: ModelMessage[]; prompt?: undefined; } & { model: LanguageModel; tools?: ToolSet | undefined; ... 13 more ...; _internal?: { ...; } | undefined; }'.
```

## Solution

- **Fixed**: Changed `maxTokens` to `maxOutputTokens` in the `generateText` call on line 62
- **Reasoning**: AI SDK v5 prefers `maxOutputTokens` over the legacy `maxTokens` property
- **Consistency**: This aligns with how the text models are handled in `src/models/text.ts`

## Changes

- `src/models/image.ts`: Updated `maxTokens: maxOutputTokens` to `maxOutputTokens: maxOutputTokens`
- `package.json`: Version bump to 1.5.13

## Testing

- ✅ Build process now completes successfully
- ✅ TypeScript compilation passes without errors
- ✅ All build targets (Node, Browser, CJS) generate correctly

This fix ensures the codebase uses current AI SDK v5 conventions consistently across all model handlers.

<!-- This is an auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->

## Summary by CodeRabbit

* **Refactor**
  * Updated image description generation settings to use a new token limit parameter for improved compatibility.

* **Chores**
  * Bumped version to 1.5.13.

<!-- end of auto-generated comment: release notes by coderabbit.ai -->
